column3: Division of Surgery and Interventional Science
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe MSc Anaesthesia and Perioperative Science is for life science graduates or healthcare professionals. It equips you with academic and professional qualities to undertake the role of Anaesthesia Associate. We combine online learning with practical skills in the clinical environment, and you are taught by experts in the perioperative field. Placements are limited and are not advertised year-round.
